      • getBasicLocator

        public java.lang.String getBasicLocator()
        Description copied from class: SeleniumComponent
        This method returns the basic location that represents the html object in the html page. For example, if a object is identified by tag , the basic xpath must be a[ \@attrib='foo' ]
        Specified by:
        getBasicLocator in class SeleniumComponent
        Returns:
        Returns a minimal xpath representation of the html object on the browser's page.
